LanguageData.EMPExplodeDesc: EMP explosion damaged the generators due to overload.
LanguageData.MessageCommandoAssaulting: Special forces begin to attack the colony.
LanguageData.BlockChanceDefualtDesc:
Deflection
The chance to block damage from outside.

 Deflecting can only block attacks within 140 degrees of the front.
This chance is based on wearer's Melee skill and armor rate of this equipment.
